Prerequisite(s): Two Riven Hourglass maneuvers
Range: Personal
Target: You
Duration: Stance

Description

You open a floodgate within your soul, channeling time-accelerating energies through your body to move at blindingly-fast speeds. While you maintain this stance, you gain the benefits of a haste spell (+1 to attack rolls, AC, and Reflex saves, a +30-foot enhancement bonus to movement speeds, and one extra attack when making a full attack), and are immune to the slow spell and similar effects. In addition, your great speed makes you exceptionally hard to hit; all attacks, powers, psi-like abilities, spells, and spell-like abilities targeting only you suffer a 20% miss chance.
